requirements.plaintext: Complete The Viparyas of Vanarana and The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail
requirements.markdown: Complete ◀The Viparyas of Vanarana▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Viparyas_of_Vanarana▷ and ◀The Rhythm that Reveals the Beastly Trail▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Rhythm_that_Reveals_the_Beastly_Trail▷

steps.plaintext: Complete World Quest Series Aranyaka: Part II - Dream Nursery
Complete the objective The Viparyas of Vanarana, and re-visit the garden in the "real" Vanarana
steps.markdown: Complete the objective ◀The Viparyas of Vanarana▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/The_Viparyas_of_Vanarana▷, and re-visit the garden in the "real" Vanarana

substeps.plaintext: Enter the cave southwest of Vanarana. The entrance is behind an Eremite tent, marked by a Seelie Court. Then, approach the Claustroflora further southwest and play the Rhythm of the Beastly Trail.
substeps.markdown: Enter the cave southwest of ◀Vanarana▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Vanarana_(Area)▷. The entrance is behind an Eremite tent, marked by a Seelie Court. Then, approach the ◀Claustroflora▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Claustroflora▷ further southwest and play the ◀Rhythm of the Beastly Trail▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Rhythm_of_the_Beastly_Trail▷.

substeps.plaintext: Varsha can be approached prior to completing The Viparyas of Vanara, but the quest does not appear in the quest log until it is completed.
substeps.markdown: Varsha can be approached prior to completing The Viparyas of Vanara, but the quest does not appear in the quest log until it is completed.
